server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ocsf.server.AbstractServer
      • server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
    This class handles the client requests. Only this class works with the data base directly.
    Author:
    Group 7
